executable.title: Compute Tube Tortuosity Measures (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes Tortuosity Measures and writes them to a CSV file
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: inputTREFile
file.label: Input Tre File
file.description: Input TRE file containing a set of tubes

file.name: outputCSVFile
file.label: Output CSV File containing the tortuosity measures
file.description: Output TRE file containing the tortuosity measures

boolean.name: curvatureMetrics
boolean.label: Curvature Metrics
boolean.description: CurvatureScalarMetric, InflectionCount1Metric, InflectionCount2Metric, Percentile95Metric, Tau4Metric, TotalCurvatureMetric, TotalSquaredCurvatureMetric

string-enumeration.name: smoothingMethod
string-enumeration.label: Smoothing Method
string-enumeration.description: Specifies the smoothing method to be applied to the vessel before computing the tortuosity measures. See SmoothTubeFunctionEnum in tubeTubeMath.h for more details.

double.name: smoothingScale
double.label: Smoothing Scale
double.description: This parameter has different meanings depending on the smoothing method used. If smoothing method is SMOOTH_TUBE_USING_INDEX_AVERAGE then smoothing scale is half of the window size. If smoothing method is SMOOTH_TUBE_USING_INDEX_GAUSSIAN or SMOOTH_TUBE_USING_DISTANCE_GAUSSIAN then smoothing scale is the gaussian's standard deviation.

integer.name: numberOfHistogramBins
integer.label: Number of histogram bins
integer.description: Number of bins to use for the curvature histogram

double.name: histogramMin
double.label: Histogram Minimum
double.description: Minimum of the range of values the histogram is computed on.

double.name: histogramMax
double.label: Histogram Maximum
double.description: Maximum of the range of values the histogram is computed on.
